Reviews.Title: Just the ticket!
Reviews.Author: Dean173
Reviews.Content: Does just what it's supposed to. Battery life +++. FM radio even sounds decent. Don't see how you can go wrong for the $$. Doesn't pretend to be anything but a phone.

Reviews.Title: As Advertised
Reviews.Author: BS Webb
Reviews.Content: This is a simple and inexpensive Unlocked Quadband. A good travel phone at a good price, with some decent bells and whistles to boot.

Reviews.Title: nice call maker/acceptor
Reviews.Author: Bonham Greaves
Reviews.Content: the phone works as expected. very suitable fo my purpose. will get another one for dad my dad's phone use

Reviews.Title: Nice phone, excellent battery life
Reviews.Author: Nguyen Khoi
Reviews.Content: The phone does its good job, even better than it is supposed to be; I don't know what I should expect more from a $29.00 phone, I can text and call real good, that is all I need. If I asked for more, I would go for a smart phone. The battery life is the most outstanding feature of this phone, can live up for more than 1 week.

Reviews.Title: Its ok
Reviews.Author: Emmanuel Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: Gets the job done. Not much else. The phone is a little sketchy on recieving calls but other than that, the phone delivers what it's supposed to do.

Reviews.Title: GOOD RECEPTION, BUT NEEDS TIME AND DATE PUT IN EACH TIME YOU POWER UP
Reviews.Author: DR
Reviews.Content: NOT AS USER FRIENDLY AS I WOULD LIKEREQUIRES RESET TIME AND DATE IF SHUT OFFHAVING TROUBLE WITH BLUETOOTH HOOK UP AND SD MICRO CHIP

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: Ralphie "Ralph"
Reviews.Content: This phone was a gift to my brother in law and he raves about its simple, unique yet trendy features..so I'll say two thumbs up..

Reviews.Title: Does the job
Reviews.Author: Rebekah
Reviews.Content: Small, easy to use and gets the job done as a back up international phone.This is my back up international phone for when I do not need data.  It's simple to use if you've had a 'dumb' phone before.  I don't like predictive text so it's fine to send old fashioned text messages (90% of what I use it for).  The alarm is LOUD and that's good.  The charge stays for days unlike smart phones.  Call quality is good enough to get your message across and back to vacation.

Reviews.Title: Worthless
Reviews.Author: AEJ
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for a trip to Europe, I also bought an International SIM card and when I was unable to set up the phone before I left I presumed it was the SIM.  When I got to Europe I bought another SIM - still wouldn't work - then went back to the store and bought yet another SIM - wouldn't work - and I realized it had to be the phone, which clearly can't be unlocked although it says that it is.  I bought another phone from the store and was able to use the SIM without a problem.  This cost me two days of non-connectivity and a lot of time running back to the store, as well as the cost of another phone and a second SIM I didn't need.  I wanted to return this phone but can't since I'm unable to find the charger that came with it - probably left in a hotel room while I was still trying to get the thing to work.  I'm annoyed at the monetary cost, but more annoyed buy the time and effort wasted.

ProductInfo.Name: BLU Aria T174 Black Blue Unlocked GSM Dual SIM QuadBand Bar Cell Phone
